description:
Killer Bee gets caught in the Infinite Tsukuyomi and begins dreaming. In his dream, Jinchuriki are being stripped of their Tailed Beast powers by the Akatsuki. Bee is determined to rescue those who have been captured, and vows to resist the Akatsuki who are coming after him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Killer Bee Rappuuden: Ten no Maki
Killer Bee fait son show, 1er volet
キラービー落風伝・天の巻
